Method.name: UpdateBuild002
UpdateBuild001
CadastrarClasseGeracaoConst
Method.Implementation:
if ($length(classe) = 0) quit
if (('$data(^COMConst(0, classe, 1))) || ($$$COMConstGenerate(^COMConst(0, classe, 1)) '= 1)) { set obj = $get(^COMConst(0, classe, 1)) set $$$COMConstGenerate(obj) = 1 set strStatus = $$$Save("COMConst", classe, obj, 1) }
